funlist.desc: In the C Programming Language, the strcat function appends a copy of the string pointed to by s2 to the end of the string pointed to by s1. It returns a pointer to s1 where the resulting concatenated string resides.
funlist.returns: The strcat function returns a pointer to s1 (where the resulting concatenated string resides).
funlist.parameters:
s1

                   A pointer to a string that will be modified. s2 will be copied to the end of s1.
s2

                   A pointer to a string that will be appended to the end of s1.
